title: S13 Ep40: The Slenderman Mysteries
itunes:title: The Slenderman Mysteries
description:
Author/Researcher Nick Redfern returns to BEYOND the DARKNESS to examine the phenomenon of the Slender Man. Rising up from curious origins on the internet, The Slender Man has become something much more deadly, and in this episode, Nick will try to answer the question, "has the Slender Man truly come to life?!"

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

http://nickredfernsbooks.blogspot.com/

www.truecar.com

save 20% off of an annual membership for the DDP YOGA NOW app and all DVD packs. Just go to ddpyoga.com/BEYOND to get started
